column6:
"CHILDHOOD'S END",2005,12
DECIMATION Tie-In!
House of M has forever changed the Xavier Institute and as if the kids didn't have enough to worry about, assassin X-23 comes to the school! Trouble is brewing as one of the X-Men's deadliest villains, William Stryker, is making news again and this time, God is on HIS side! Part 2 (of 4)!

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | inker:Rick Ketcham | writer:Craig Kyle | writer:Chris Yost | colorist:Brian Reber | letterer:Dave Sharpe
